 1	import axios, { AxiosInstance, AxiosRequestConfig, AxiosResponse } from 'axios';
 2	import AsyncStorage from '@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';
 3	import { API_CONFIG, STORAGE_KEYS } from '../constants/api';
 4	import { ApiError } from '../types';
 5	
 6	class ApiClient {
 7	 private client: AxiosInstance;
 8	
 9	 constructor() {
 10	 this.client = axios.create({
 11	 baseURL: API_CONFIG.BASE_URL,
 12	 timeout: API_CONFIG.TIMEOUT,
 13	 headers: {
 14	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 15	 },
 16	 });
 17	
 18	 this.setupInterceptors();
 19	 }
 20	
 21	 private setupInterceptors() {
 22	 // Request interceptor to add auth token
 23	 this.client.interceptors.request.use(
 24	 async (config) => {
 25	 const token = await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN);
 26	 if (token) {
 27	 config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
 28	 }
 29	 return config;
 30	 },
 31	 (error) => {
 32	 return Promise.reject(error);
 33	 }
 34	 );
 35	
 36	 // Response interceptor to handle errors
 37	 this.client.interceptors.response.use(
 38	 (response: AxiosResponse) => {
 39	 return response;
 40	 },
...
 69	
 70	 throw this.createApiError(error);
 71	 }
 72	 );
 73	 }
 74	
 75	 private createApiError(error: any): ApiError {
 76	 if (error.response) {
 77	 return {
 78	 message: error.response.data?.message || 'An error occurred',
 79	 status: error.response.status,
 80	 code: error.response.data?.code,
 81	 };
 82	 } else if (error.request) {
 83	 return {
 84	 message: 'Network error. Please check your connection.',
 85	 status: 0,
 86	 };
 87	 } else {
 88	 return {
 89	 message: error.message || 'An unexpected error occurred',
 90	 status: 0,
 91	 };
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	
 95	 private async clearAuthData() {
 96	 await AsyncStorage.multiRemove([
 97	 STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN,
 98	 STORAGE_KEYS.USER,
 99	 STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN,
 100	 ]);
 101	 }
 102	
 103	 // HTTP Methods
 104	 async get<T>(url: string, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
 105	 const response = await this.client.get<T>(url, config);
 106	 return response.data;
 107	 }

 8	 User, 
 9	 ApiResponse 
 10	} from '../types';
 11	
 12	class AuthService {
 13	 // Login user
 14	 async login(credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
 15	 try {
 16	 const response = await apiClient.post<ApiResponse<AuthResponse>>(
 17	 API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN,
 18	 credentials
 19	 );
 20	
 21	 if (response.success && response.data) {
 22	 await this.storeAuthData(response.data);
 23	 return response.data;
 24	 } else {
 25	 throw new Error(response.message || 'Login failed');
 26	 }
 27	 } catch (error: any) {
 28	 throw new Error(error.message || 'Login failed');
 29	 }
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 // Admin login
 33	 async adminLogin(credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
 34	 try {
 35	 const response = await apiClient.post<ApiResponse<AuthResponse>>(
 36	 API_ENDPOINTS.ADMIN_LOGIN,
 37	 credentials
 38	 );
 39	
 40	 if (response.success && response.data) {
 41	 await this.storeAuthData(response.data);
 42	 return response.data;
 43	 } else {
 44	 throw new Error(response.message || 'Admin login failed');
 45	 }
 46	 } catch (error: any) {
 47	 throw new Error(error.message || 'Admin login failed');
 48	 }
 49	 }
 50	
 51	 // Register user
 52	 async register(userData: RegisterRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
 53	 try {
 54	 const response = await apiClient.post<ApiResponse<AuthResponse>>(
 55	 API_ENDPOINTS.REGISTER,
 56	 userData
 57	 );
 58	
 59	 if (response.success && response.data) {
 60	 await this.storeAuthData(response.data);
 61	 return response.data;
 62	 } else {
 63	 throw new Error(response.message || 'Registration failed');
 64	 }
 65	 } catch (error: any) {
 66	 throw new Error(error.message || 'Registration failed');
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	
 70	 // Logout user
 71	 async logout(): Promise<void> {
 72	 try {
 73	 await AsyncStorage.multiRemove([
 74	 STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN,
 75	 STORAGE_KEYS.USER,
 76	 STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN,
 77	 ]);
 78	 await apiClient.clearAuthToken();
 79	 } catch (error) {
 80	 console.error('Logout error:', error);
 81	 }
 82	 }
 83	
 84	 // Get current user from storage
 85	 async getCurrentUser(): Promise<User | null> {
 86	 try {
 87	 const userData = await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.USER);
 88	 return userData ? JSON.parse(userData) : null;
 89	 } catch (error) {
 90	 console.error('Get current user error:', error);
 91	 return null;
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	
 95	 // Get auth token from storage
 96	 async getAuthToken(): Promise<string | null> {
 97	 try {
 98	 return await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN);
 99	 } catch (error) {
 100	 console.error('Get auth token error:', error);
 101	 return null;
 102	 }
 103	 }
 104	
 105	 // Check if user is authenticated
 106	 async isAuthenticated(): Promise<boolean> {
 107	 try {
 108	 const token = await this.getAuthToken();
 109	 const user = await this.getCurrentUser();
 110	 return !!(token && user);
 111	 } catch (error) {
 112	 console.error('Is authenticated error:', error);
 113	 return false;
 114	 }
 115	 }
 116	
 117	 // Check if user is admin
 118	 async isAdmin(): Promise<boolean> {
 119	 try {
 120	 const user = await this.getCurrentUser();
 121	 return user?.role === 'ADMIN';
 122	 } catch (error) {
 123	 console.error('Is admin error:', error);
 124	 return false;
 125	 }
 126	 }
...
 146	
 147	 // Store authentication data
 148	 private async storeAuthData(authData: AuthResponse): Promise<void> {
 149	 try {
 150	 await AsyncStorage.multiSet([
 151	 [STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN, authData.token],
 152	 [STORAGE_KEYS.USER, JSON.stringify(authData.user)],
 153	 ]);
 154	 await apiClient.setAuthToken(authData.token);
 155	 } catch (error) {
 156	 console.error('Store auth data error:', error);
 157	 throw new Error('Failed to store authentication data');
 158	 }
 159	 }
 160	}
 161	
 162	export const authService = new AuthService();

# **Complete API Endpoints List for Spring Boot Backend**

## **Authentication Endpoints**

### 1. **POST** `/api/auth/login`
**Purpose:** User login 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "username": "string",
 "password": "string"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "token": "jwt_token_string",
 "user": {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
 },
 "message": "Login successful"
}
```

### 2. **POST** `/api/auth/register`
**Purpose:** User registration 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "password": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string"
}
```
**Response:** Same as login response

### 3. **POST** `/api/auth/admin/login`
**Purpose:** Admin login (validates admin role) 
**Request Body:** Same as regular login 
**Response:** Same as login response (but user.role must be "ADMIN")

### 4. **POST** `/api/auth/refresh`
**Purpose:** Refresh JWT token 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "refreshToken": "string"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "token": "new_jwt_token_string"
 }
}
```

---

## **User Profile Endpoints**

### 5. **GET** `/api/users/profile`
**Purpose:** Get current user profile 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER|ADMIN",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
}
```

### 6. **PUT** `/api/users/profile`
**Purpose:** Update user profile 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string"
}
```
**Response:** Same as GET profile response

---

## **Task Management Endpoints**

### 7. **GET** `/api/tasks`
**Purpose:** Get user's tasks with pagination 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?page=0&size=20` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "content": [
 {
 "id": "string",
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "status": "TODO|IN_PROGRESS|COMPLETED|CANCELLED",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "userId": "string",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
 }
 ],
 "totalElements": 100,
 "totalPages": 5,
 "size": 20,
 "number": 0
 }
}
```

### 8. **POST** `/api/tasks`
**Purpose:** Create new task 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "id": "string",
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "status": "TODO",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "userId": "string",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
 }
}
```

### 9. **GET** `/api/tasks/{id}`
**Purpose:** Get specific task by ID 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Response:** Single task object (same structure as POST response)

### 10. **PUT** `/api/tasks/{id}`
**Purpose:** Update existing task 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "status": "TODO|IN_PROGRESS|COMPLETED|CANCELLED",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
}
```
**Response:** Updated task object

### 11. **DELETE** `/api/tasks/{id}`
**Purpose:** Delete task 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "message": "Task deleted successfully"
}
```

### 12. **GET** `/api/tasks/quadrant/{quadrant}`
**Purpose:** Get tasks by Eisenhower quadrant 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Path Parameters:** `quadrant` = `URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT` 
**Query Parameters:** `?page=0&size=20` 
**Response:** Same paginated structure as GET /api/tasks

### 13. **GET** `/api/tasks/search`
**Purpose:** Search tasks by query 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?q=search_term&page=0&size=20` 
**Response:** Same paginated structure as GET /api/tasks

---

## ‍ **Admin Endpoints**

### 14. **GET** `/api/admin/users`
**Purpose:** Get all users (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?page=0&size=20` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "content": [
 {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER|ADMIN",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
 ],
 "totalElements": 100,
 "totalPages": 5,
 "size": 20,
 "number": 0
 }
}
```

### 15. **GET** `/api/admin/stats`
**Purpose:** Get admin dashboard statistics 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "totalUsers": 150,
 "totalTasks": 1250,
 "activeUsers": 75,
 "completedTasks": 800,
 "pendingTasks": 450
 }
}
```

### 16. **DELETE** `/api/admin/users/{id}`
**Purpose:** Delete user (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "message": "User deleted successfully"
}
```

### 17. **PATCH** `/api/admin/users/{id}/role`
**Purpose:** Update user role (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "role": "USER|ADMIN"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER|ADMIN",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
}
```

### 18. **GET** `/api/admin/users/search`
**Purpose:** Search users (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?q=search_term&page=0&size=20` 
**Response:** Same paginated structure as GET /api/admin/users

---

## **Important Implementation Notes**

### **Authentication & Authorization:**
- All endpoints except auth endpoints require JWT token in Authorization header
- Admin endpoints require user role to be "ADMIN"
- Token refresh should be automatic when 401 is returned

### **Error Response Format:**
```json
{
 "success": false,
 "message": "Error description",
 "code": "ERROR_CODE"
}
```

### **HTTP Status Codes:**
- **200**: Success
- **201**: Created (for POST requests)
- **400**: Bad Request
- **401**: Unauthorized
- **403**: Forbidden (insufficient permissions)
- **404**: Not Found
- **500**: Internal Server Error

### **Database Considerations:**
- User passwords should be hashed (BCrypt recommended)
- Tasks should be linked to users via userId foreign key
- Implement proper indexing for search functionality
- Consider soft deletes for audit trails

This comprehensive API specification should cover all the functionality required by your React Native TaskifyApp frontend!

 99	
 100	## API Endpoints
 101	
 102	The app expects the following REST API endpoints from your Spring Boot backend:
 103	
 104	### Authentication Endpoints
 105	```
 106	POST /api/auth/login
 107	POST /api/auth/register
 108	POST /api/auth/admin/login
 109	POST /api/auth/refresh
 110	```
 111	
 112	### User Endpoints
 113	```
 114	GET /api/users/profile
 115	PUT /api/users/profile
 116	```
 117	
 118	### Task Endpoints
 119	```
 120	GET /api/tasks
 121	POST /api/tasks
 122	GET /api/tasks/{id}
 123	PUT /api/tasks/{id}
 124	DELETE /api/tasks/{id}
 125	GET /api/tasks/quadrant/{quadrant}
 126	GET /api/tasks/search?q={query}
 127	```
 128	
 129	### Admin Endpoints
 130	```
 131	GET /api/admin/users
 132	GET /api/admin/stats
 133	DELETE /api/admin/users/{id}
 134	PATCH /api/admin/users/{id}/role
 135	GET /api/admin/users/search?q={query}
 136	```
 137	
 138	## Project Structure
...
 161	├── contexts/ # React Context providers
 162	│ ├── AuthContext.tsx # Authentication state
 163	│ └── TaskContext.tsx # Task management state
 164	├── services/ # API service layers
 165	│ ├── apiClient.ts # HTTP client configuration
 166	│ ├── authService.ts # Authentication services
 167	│ ├── taskService.ts # Task management services
 168	│ └── adminService.ts # Admin services
 169	├── types/ # TypeScript type definitions
 170	│ └── index.ts
 171	├── constants/ # App constants and configuration
 172	│ ├── api.ts # API endpoints and config
 173	│ └── theme.ts # Theme and styling constants
 174	└── assets/ # Static assets
 175	```
 176	
 177	## Key Features Implementation
 178	
 179	### Authentication Flow
 180	1. User opens app → Check stored token
 181	2. If valid token exists → Navigate to main app
 182	3. If no token → Navigate to login screen
 183	4. After successful login → Store token and user data
 184	5. API requests automatically include auth headers
 185	
 186	### Task Management
 187	- Tasks are categorized using the Eisenhower Matrix
 188	- Real-time updates across all screens
 189	- Optimistic UI updates for better UX
 190	- Error handling with user-friendly messages
 191	
 192	### Admin Features
 193	- Role-based access control
 194	- Admin-only screens and features
 195	- User management capabilities
 196	- System statistics dashboard
 197	
 198	## Configuration
 199	
 200	### Environment Variables
 201	Create a `.env` file in the root directory:
 202	```
 203	API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080/api
 204	API_TIMEOUT=10000
 205	```

 6	class ApiClient {
 7	 private client: AxiosInstance;
 8	
 9	 constructor() {
 10	 this.client = axios.create({
 11	 baseURL: API_CONFIG.BASE_URL,
 12	 timeout: API_CONFIG.TIMEOUT,
 13	 headers: {
 14	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 15	 },
 16	 });

 41	 async (error) => {
 42	 const originalRequest = error.config;
 43	
 44	 // Handle 401 errors (unauthorized)
 45	 if (error.response?.status === 401 && !originalRequest._retry) {
 46	 originalRequest._retry = true;
 47	 
 48	 try {
 49	 // Try to refresh token
 50	 const refreshToken = await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN);
 51	 if (refreshToken) {
 52	 const response = await this.client.post('/auth/refresh', {
 53	 refreshToken,
 54	 });
 55	 
 56	 const { token } = response.data;
 57	 await AsyncStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN, token);
 58	 
 59	 // Retry original request
 60	 originalRequest.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
 61	 return this.client(originalRequest);
 62	 }
 63	 } catch (refreshError) {
 64	 // Refresh failed, redirect to login
 65	 await this.clearAuthData();
 66	 throw this.createApiError(error);
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	
 70	 throw this.createApiError(error);
 71	 }
 72	 );
 73	 }
 74	
 75	 private createApiError(error: any): ApiError {
 76	 if (error.response) {
 77	 return {
 78	 message: error.response.data?.message || 'An error occurred',
 79	 status: error.response.status,
 80	 code: error.response.data?.code,
 81	 };
 82	 } else if (error.request) {
 83	 return {
 84	 message: 'Network error. Please check your connection.',
 85	 status: 0,
 86	 };
 87	 } else {
 88	 return {
 89	 message: error.message || 'An unexpected error occurred',
 90	 status: 0,
 91	 };
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	
 95	 private async clearAuthData() {
 96	 await AsyncStorage.multiRemove([
 97	 STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN,
 98	 STORAGE_KEYS.USER,
 99	 STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN,
 100	 ]);
 101	 }
 102	
 103	 // HTTP Methods
 104	 async get<T>(url: string, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
 105	 const response = await this.client.get<T>(url, config);
 106	 return response.data;
 107	 }

# **Complete API Endpoints List for Spring Boot Backend**

## **Authentication Endpoints**

### 1. **POST** `/api/auth/login`
**Purpose:** User login 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "username": "string",
 "password": "string"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "token": "jwt_token_string",
 "user": {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
 },
 "message": "Login successful"
}
```

### 2. **POST** `/api/auth/register`
**Purpose:** User registration 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "password": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string"
}
```
**Response:** Same as login response

### 3. **POST** `/api/auth/admin/login`
**Purpose:** Admin login (validates admin role) 
**Request Body:** Same as regular login 
**Response:** Same as login response (but user.role must be "ADMIN")

### 4. **POST** `/api/auth/refresh`
**Purpose:** Refresh JWT token 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "refreshToken": "string"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "token": "new_jwt_token_string"
 }
}
```

---

## **User Profile Endpoints**

### 5. **GET** `/api/users/profile`
**Purpose:** Get current user profile 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER|ADMIN",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
}
```

### 6. **PUT** `/api/users/profile`
**Purpose:** Update user profile 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string"
}
```
**Response:** Same as GET profile response

---

## **Task Management Endpoints**

### 7. **GET** `/api/tasks`
**Purpose:** Get user's tasks with pagination 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?page=0&size=20` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "content": [
 {
 "id": "string",
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "status": "TODO|IN_PROGRESS|COMPLETED|CANCELLED",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "userId": "string",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
 }
 ],
 "totalElements": 100,
 "totalPages": 5,
 "size": 20,
 "number": 0
 }
}
```

### 8. **POST** `/api/tasks`
**Purpose:** Create new task 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "id": "string",
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "status": "TODO",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "userId": "string",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
 }
}
```

### 9. **GET** `/api/tasks/{id}`
**Purpose:** Get specific task by ID 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Response:** Single task object (same structure as POST response)

### 10. **PUT** `/api/tasks/{id}`
**Purpose:** Update existing task 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "title": "string",
 "description": "string",
 "priority": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|URGENT",
 "status": "TODO|IN_PROGRESS|COMPLETED|CANCELLED",
 "dueDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "eisenhowerQuadrant": "URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT"
}
```
**Response:** Updated task object

### 11. **DELETE** `/api/tasks/{id}`
**Purpose:** Delete task 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "message": "Task deleted successfully"
}
```

### 12. **GET** `/api/tasks/quadrant/{quadrant}`
**Purpose:** Get tasks by Eisenhower quadrant 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Path Parameters:** `quadrant` = `URGENT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_IMPORTANT|URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT|NOT_URGENT_NOT_IMPORTANT` 
**Query Parameters:** `?page=0&size=20` 
**Response:** Same paginated structure as GET /api/tasks

### 13. **GET** `/api/tasks/search`
**Purpose:** Search tasks by query 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?q=search_term&page=0&size=20` 
**Response:** Same paginated structure as GET /api/tasks

---

## ‍ **Admin Endpoints**

### 14. **GET** `/api/admin/users`
**Purpose:** Get all users (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?page=0&size=20` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "content": [
 {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER|ADMIN",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
 ],
 "totalElements": 100,
 "totalPages": 5,
 "size": 20,
 "number": 0
 }
}
```

### 15. **GET** `/api/admin/stats`
**Purpose:** Get admin dashboard statistics 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "totalUsers": 150,
 "totalTasks": 1250,
 "activeUsers": 75,
 "completedTasks": 800,
 "pendingTasks": 450
 }
}
```

### 16. **DELETE** `/api/admin/users/{id}`
**Purpose:** Delete user (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "message": "User deleted successfully"
}
```

### 17. **PATCH** `/api/admin/users/{id}/role`
**Purpose:** Update user role (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Request Body:**
```json
{
 "role": "USER|ADMIN"
}
```
**Response:**
```json
{
 "success": true,
 "data": {
 "id": "string",
 "username": "string",
 "email": "string",
 "firstName": "string",
 "lastName": "string",
 "role": "USER|ADMIN",
 "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
 "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
 }
}
```

### 18. **GET** `/api/admin/users/search`
**Purpose:** Search users (admin only) 
**Headers:** `Authorization: Bearer {admin_token}` 
**Query Parameters:** `?q=search_term&page=0&size=20` 
**Response:** Same paginated structure as GET /api/admin/users

---

## **Important Implementation Notes**

### **Authentication & Authorization:**
- All endpoints except auth endpoints require JWT token in Authorization header
- Admin endpoints require user role to be "ADMIN"
- Token refresh should be automatic when 401 is returned

### **Error Response Format:**
```json
{
 "success": false,
 "message": "Error description",
 "code": "ERROR_CODE"
}
```

### **HTTP Status Codes:**
- **200**: Success
- **201**: Created (for POST requests)
- **400**: Bad Request
- **401**: Unauthorized
- **403**: Forbidden (insufficient permissions)
- **404**: Not Found
- **500**: Internal Server Error

### **Database Considerations:**
- User passwords should be hashed (BCrypt recommended)
- Tasks should be linked to users via userId foreign key
- Implement proper indexing for search functionality
- Consider soft deletes for audit trails

This comprehensive API specification should cover all the functionality required by your React Native TaskifyApp frontend!

 26	You can start developing by editing the files inside the **app** directory. This project uses [file-based routing](https://docs.expo.dev/router/introduction).
 27	
 28	## Get a fresh project
 29	
 30	When you're ready, run:
 31	
 32	```bash
 33	npm run reset-project
 34	```
 35	
 36	This command will move the starter code to the **app-example** directory and create a blank **app** directory where you can start developing.
 37	
 38	## Learn more
 39	
 40	To learn more about developing your project with Expo, look at the following resources:
 41	
 42	- [Expo documentation](https://docs.expo.dev/): Learn fundamentals, or go into advanced topics with our [guides](https://docs.expo.dev/guides).
 43	- [Learn Expo tutorial](https://docs.expo.dev/tutorial/introduction/): Follow a step-by-step tutorial where you'll create a project that runs on Android, iOS, and the web.
 44	
 45	## Join the community
 46	
 47	Join our community of developers creating universal apps.
 48	
 49	- [Expo on GitHub](https://github.com/expo/expo): View our open source platform and contribute.
 50	- [Discord community](https://chat.expo.dev): Chat with Expo users and ask questions.

Path: README.md
...
 44	
 45	### Frontend
 46	- **React Native** with Expo
 47	- **TypeScript** for type safety
 48	- **Expo Router** for navigation
 49	- **React Context** for state management
 50	- **Axios** for API communication
 51	- **AsyncStorage** for local data persistence
 52	
 53	### Backend Requirements
 54	- **Spring Boot** REST API
 55	- **JWT** authentication
 56	- **MySQL/PostgreSQL** database
 57	- **Spring Security** for authentication
 58	
 59	## Installation
 60	
 61	### Prerequisites
 62	- Node.js (v16 or higher)
 63	- npm or yarn
 64	- Expo CLI (`npm install -g @expo/cli`)
 65	- Android Studio (for Android development)
 66	- Xcode (for iOS development, macOS only)
 67	
 68	### Setup Instructions
 69	
 70	1. **Clone the repository**
 71	 ```bash
 72	 git clone <repository-url>
 73	 cd TaskifyApp
 74	 ```
 75	
 76	2. **Install dependencies**
 77	 ```bash
 78	 npm install
 79	 ```
 80	
 81	3. **Configure API endpoint**
 82	 Update the `API_CONFIG.BASE_URL` in `constants/api.ts`:
 83	 ```typescript
 84	 export const API_CONFIG = {
 85	 BASE_URL: 'http://your-backend-url:8080/api', // Update this
 86	 TIMEOUT: 10000,
 87	 };
 88	 ```
 89	
 90	4. **Start the development server**
 91	 ```bash
 92	 npm start
 93	 ```
 94	
 95	5. **Run on device/simulator**
 96	 - For iOS: `npm run ios`
 97	 - For Android: `npm run android`
 98	 - For web: `npm run web`
 99	
 100	## API Endpoints
 101	
 102	The app expects the following REST API endpoints from your Spring Boot backend:
 103	
 104	### Authentication Endpoints
 105	```
 106	POST /api/auth/login
 107	POST /api/auth/register
 108	POST /api/auth/admin/login
 109	POST /api/auth/refresh
 110	```
 111	
 112	### User Endpoints
 113	```
 114	GET /api/users/profile
 115	PUT /api/users/profile
 116	```
 117	
 118	### Task Endpoints
 119	```
 120	GET /api/tasks
 121	POST /api/tasks
 122	GET /api/tasks/{id}
 123	PUT /api/tasks/{id}
 124	DELETE /api/tasks/{id}
 125	GET /api/tasks/quadrant/{quadrant}
 126	GET /api/tasks/search?q={query}
 127	```
 128	
 129	### Admin Endpoints
 130	```
 131	GET /api/admin/users
 132	GET /api/admin/stats
 133	DELETE /api/admin/users/{id}
 134	PATCH /api/admin/users/{id}/role
 135	GET /api/admin/users/search?q={query}
 136	```
 137	
 138	## Project Structure
...
 161	├── contexts/ # React Context providers
 162	│ ├── AuthContext.tsx # Authentication state
 163	│ └── TaskContext.tsx # Task management state
 164	├── services/ # API service layers
 165	│ ├── apiClient.ts # HTTP client configuration
 166	│ ├── authService.ts # Authentication services
 167	│ ├── taskService.ts # Task management services
 168	│ └── adminService.ts # Admin services
 169	├── types/ # TypeScript type definitions
 170	│ └── index.ts
 171	├── constants/ # App constants and configuration
 172	│ ├── api.ts # API endpoints and config
 173	│ └── theme.ts # Theme and styling constants
 174	└── assets/ # Static assets
 175	```
 176	
 177	## Key Features Implementation
...

 1	import axios, { AxiosInstance, AxiosRequestConfig, AxiosResponse } from 'axios';
 2	import AsyncStorage from '@react-native-async-storage/async-storage';
 3	import { API_CONFIG, STORAGE_KEYS } from '../constants/api';
 4	import { ApiError } from '../types';
 5	
 6	class ApiClient {
 7	 private client: AxiosInstance;
 8	
 9	 constructor() {
 10	 this.client = axios.create({
 11	 baseURL: API_CONFIG.BASE_URL,
 12	 timeout: API_CONFIG.TIMEOUT,
 13	 headers: {
 14	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 15	 },
 16	 });
 17	
 18	 this.setupInterceptors();
 19	 }
 20	
 21	 private setupInterceptors() {
 22	 // Request interceptor to add auth token
 23	 this.client.interceptors.request.use(
 24	 async (config) => {
 25	 const token = await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN);
 26	 if (token) {
 27	 config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
 28	 }
 29	 return config;
 30	 },
 31	 (error) => {
 32	 return Promise.reject(error);
 33	 }
 34	 );
 35	
 36	 // Response interceptor to handle errors
 37	 this.client.interceptors.response.use(
 38	 (response: AxiosResponse) => {
 39	 return response;
 40	 },
...
 69	
 70	 throw this.createApiError(error);
 71	 }
 72	 );
 73	 }
 74	
 75	 private createApiError(error: any): ApiError {
 76	 if (error.response) {
 77	 return {
 78	 message: error.response.data?.message || 'An error occurred',
 79	 status: error.response.status,
 80	 code: error.response.data?.code,
 81	 };
 82	 } else if (error.request) {
 83	 return {
 84	 message: 'Network error. Please check your connection.',
 85	 status: 0,
 86	 };
 87	 } else {
 88	 return {
 89	 message: error.message || 'An unexpected error occurred',
 90	 status: 0,
 91	 };
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	
 95	 private async clearAuthData() {
 96	 await AsyncStorage.multiRemove([
 97	 STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN,
 98	 STORAGE_KEYS.USER,
 99	 STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN,
 100	 ]);
 101	 }
 102	
 103	 // HTTP Methods
 104	 async get<T>(url: string, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
 105	 const response = await this.client.get<T>(url, config);
 106	 return response.data;
 107	 }

 11	
 12	class AuthService {
 13	 // Login user
 14	 async login(credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
 15	 try {
 16	 const response = await apiClient.post<ApiResponse<AuthResponse>>(
 17	 API_ENDPOINTS.LOGIN,
 18	 credentials
 19	 );
 20	
 21	 if (response.success && response.data) {
 22	 await this.storeAuthData(response.data);
 23	 return response.data;
 24	 } else {
 25	 throw new Error(response.message || 'Login failed');
 26	 }
 27	 } catch (error: any) {
 28	 throw new Error(error.message || 'Login failed');
 29	 }
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 // Admin login
 33	 async adminLogin(credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
 34	 try {
 35	 const response = await apiClient.post<ApiResponse<AuthResponse>>(
 36	 API_ENDPOINTS.ADMIN_LOGIN,
 37	 credentials
 38	 );
 39	
 40	 if (response.success && response.data) {
 41	 await this.storeAuthData(response.data);
 42	 return response.data;
 43	 } else {
 44	 throw new Error(response.message || 'Admin login failed');
 45	 }
 46	 } catch (error: any) {
 47	 throw new Error(error.message || 'Admin login failed');
 48	 }
 49	 }
 50	
 51	 // Register user
 52	 async register(userData: RegisterRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
 53	 try {
 54	 const response = await apiClient.post<ApiResponse<AuthResponse>>(
 55	 API_ENDPOINTS.REGISTER,
 56	 userData
 57	 );
 58	
 59	 if (response.success && response.data) {
 60	 await this.storeAuthData(response.data);
 61	 return response.data;
 62	 } else {
 63	 throw new Error(response.message || 'Registration failed');
 64	 }
 65	 } catch (error: any) {
 66	 throw new Error(error.message || 'Registration failed');
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	
 70	 // Logout user
 71	 async logout(): Promise<void> {
 72	 try {
 73	 await AsyncStorage.multiRemove([
 74	 STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN,
 75	 STORAGE_KEYS.USER,
 76	 STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN,
 77	 ]);
 78	 await apiClient.clearAuthToken();
 79	 } catch (error) {
 80	 console.error('Logout error:', error);
 81	 }
 82	 }
 83	
 84	 // Get current user from storage
 85	 async getCurrentUser(): Promise<User | null> {
 86	 try {
 87	 const userData = await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.USER);
 88	 return userData ? JSON.parse(userData) : null;
 89	 } catch (error) {
 90	 console.error('Get current user error:', error);
 91	 return null;
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	
 95	 // Get auth token from storage
 96	 async getAuthToken(): Promise<string | null> {
 97	 try {
 98	 return await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN);
 99	 } catch (error) {
 100	 console.error('Get auth token error:', error);
 101	 return null;
 102	 }
 103	 }
 104	
 105	 // Check if user is authenticated
 106	 async isAuthenticated(): Promise<boolean> {
 107	 try {
 108	 const token = await this.getAuthToken();
 109	 const user = await this.getCurrentUser();
 110	 return !!(token && user);
 111	 } catch (error) {
 112	 console.error('Is authenticated error:', error);
 113	 return false;
 114	 }
 115	 }
 116	
 117	 // Check if user is admin
 118	 async isAdmin(): Promise<boolean> {
 119	 try {
 120	 const user = await this.getCurrentUser();
 121	 return user?.role === 'ADMIN';
 122	 } catch (error) {
 123	 console.error('Is admin error:', error);
 124	 return false;
 125	 }
 126	 }

 146	
 147	 // Store authentication data
 148	 private async storeAuthData(authData: AuthResponse): Promise<void> {
 149	 try {
 150	 await AsyncStorage.multiSet([
 151	 [STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN, authData.token],
 152	 [STORAGE_KEYS.USER, JSON.stringify(authData.user)],
 153	 ]);
 154	 await apiClient.setAuthToken(authData.token);
 155	 } catch (error) {
 156	 console.error('Store auth data error:', error);
 157	 throw new Error('Failed to store authentication data');
 158	 }
 159	 }
 160	}

 80	
 81	3. **Configure API endpoint**
 82	 Update the `API_CONFIG.BASE_URL` in `constants/api.ts`:
 83	 ```typescript
 84	 export const API_CONFIG = {
 85	 BASE_URL: 'http://your-backend-url:8080/api', // Update this
 86	 TIMEOUT: 10000,
 87	 };
 88	 ```
 89	
 90	4. **Start the development server**
 91	 ```bash
 92	 npm start
 93	 ```
 94	
 95	5. **Run on device/simulator**
 96	 - For iOS: `npm run ios`
 97	 - For Android: `npm run android`
 98	 - For web: `npm run web`
 99	
 100	## API Endpoints
 101	
 102	The app expects the following REST API endpoints from your Spring Boot backend:
 103	
 104	### Authentication Endpoints
 105	```
 106	POST /api/auth/login
 107	POST /api/auth/register
 108	POST /api/auth/admin/login
 109	POST /api/auth/refresh
 110	```
 111	
 112	### User Endpoints
 113	```
 114	GET /api/users/profile
 115	PUT /api/users/profile
 116	```
 117	
 118	### Task Endpoints
 119	```
 120	GET /api/tasks
 121	POST /api/tasks
 122	GET /api/tasks/{id}
 123	PUT /api/tasks/{id}
 124	DELETE /api/tasks/{id}
 125	GET /api/tasks/quadrant/{quadrant}
 126	GET /api/tasks/search?q={query}
 127	```
 128	
 129	### Admin Endpoints
 130	```
 131	GET /api/admin/users
 132	GET /api/admin/stats
 133	DELETE /api/admin/users/{id}
 134	PATCH /api/admin/users/{id}/role
 135	GET /api/admin/users/search?q={query}
 136	```
 137	
 138	## Project Structure
...
 161	├── contexts/ # React Context providers
 162	│ ├── AuthContext.tsx # Authentication state
 163	│ └── TaskContext.tsx # Task management state
 164	├── services/ # API service layers
 165	│ ├── apiClient.ts # HTTP client configuration
 166	│ ├── authService.ts # Authentication services
 167	│ ├── taskService.ts # Task management services
 168	│ └── adminService.ts # Admin services
 169	├── types/ # TypeScript type definitions
 170	│ └── index.ts
 171	├── constants/ # App constants and configuration
 172	│ ├── api.ts # API endpoints and config
 173	│ └── theme.ts # Theme and styling constants
 174	└── assets/ # Static assets
 175	```
 176	
 177	## Key Features Implementation
 178	
 179	### Authentication Flow
 180	1. User opens app → Check stored token
 181	2. If valid token exists → Navigate to main app
 182	3. If no token → Navigate to login screen
 183	4. After successful login → Store token and user data
 184	5. API requests automatically include auth headers
 185	
 186	### Task Management
 187	- Tasks are categorized using the Eisenhower Matrix
 188	- Real-time updates across all screens
 189	- Optimistic UI updates for better UX
 190	- Error handling with user-friendly messages
 191	
 192	### Admin Features
 193	- Role-based access control
 194	- Admin-only screens and features
 195	- User management capabilities
 196	- System statistics dashboard
 197	
 198	## Configuration
 199	
 200	### Environment Variables
 201	Create a `.env` file in the root directory:
 202	```
 203	API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080/api
 204	API_TIMEOUT=10000
 205	```

 1	import React, { createContext, useContext, useEffect, useState, ReactNode } from 'react';
 2	import { authService } from '../services/authService';
 3	import { AuthContextType, User, RegisterRequest } from '../types';
 4	
 5	const AuthContext = createContext<AuthContextType | undefined>(undefined);
 6	
 7	interface AuthProviderProps {
 8	 children: ReactNode;
 9	}
 10	
 11	export const AuthProvider: React.FC<AuthProviderProps> = ({ children }) => {
 12	 const [user, setUser] = useState<User | null>(null);
 13	 const [token, setToken] = useState<string | null>(null);
 14	 const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
 15	
 16	 useEffect(() => {
 17	 checkAuthState();
 18	 }, []);
 19	
 20	 const checkAuthState = async () => {
 21	 try {
 22	 setIsLoading(true);
 23	 const [currentUser, authToken] = await Promise.all([
 24	 authService.getCurrentUser(),
 25	 authService.getAuthToken(),
 26	 ]);
 27	
 28	 if (currentUser && authToken) {
 29	 setUser(currentUser);
 30	 setToken(authToken);
 31	 }
 32	 } catch (error) {
 33	 console.error('Auth state check error:', error);
 34	 } finally {
 35	 setIsLoading(false);
 36	 }
 37	 };
...
 52	
 53	 const adminLogin = async (username: string, password: string): Promise<void> => {
 54	 try {
 55	 setIsLoading(true);
 56	 const authResponse = await authService.adminLogin({ username, password });
 57	 
 58	 if (authResponse.user.role !== 'ADMIN') {
 59	 throw new Error('Access denied. Admin privileges required.');
 60	 }
 61	 
 62	 setUser(authResponse.user);
 63	 setToken(authResponse.token);
 64	 } catch (error) {
 65	 console.error('Admin login error:', error);
 66	 throw error;
 67	 } finally {
 68	 setIsLoading(false);
 69	 }
 70	 };
 71	
 72	 const register = async (data: RegisterRequest): Promise<void> => {
 73	 try {
 74	 setIsLoading(true);
 75	 const authResponse = await authService.register(data);
 76	 setUser(authResponse.user);
 77	 setToken(authResponse.token);
 78	 } catch (error) {
 79	 console.error('Registration error:', error);
 80	 throw error;
 81	 } finally {
 82	 setIsLoading(false);
 83	 }
 84	 };
 85	
 86	 const logout = async (): Promise<void> => {
 87	 try {
 88	 setIsLoading(true);
 89	 await authService.logout();
 90	 setUser(null);
 91	 setToken(null);
 92	 } catch (error) {
 93	 console.error('Logout error:', error);
 94	 } finally {
 95	 setIsLoading(false);
 96	 }
 97	 };
 98	
 99	 const value: AuthContextType = {
 100	 user,
 101	 token,
 102	 isLoading,
 103	 login,
 104	 adminLogin,
 105	 register,
 106	 logout,
 107	 };
 108	
 109	 return (
 110	 <AuthContext.Provider value={value}>
 111	 {children}
 112	 </AuthContext.Provider>
 113	 );
 114	};

 3	import { API_CONFIG, STORAGE_KEYS } from '../constants/api';
 4	import { ApiError } from '../types';
 5	
 6	class ApiClient {
 7	 private client: AxiosInstance;
 8	
 9	 constructor() {
 10	 this.client = axios.create({
 11	 baseURL: API_CONFIG.BASE_URL,
 12	 timeout: API_CONFIG.TIMEOUT,
 13	 headers: {
 14	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 15	 },
 16	 });

 41	 async (error) => {
 42	 const originalRequest = error.config;
 43	
 44	 // Handle 401 errors (unauthorized)
 45	 if (error.response?.status === 401 && !originalRequest._retry) {
 46	 originalRequest._retry = true;
 47	 
 48	 try {
 49	 // Try to refresh token
 50	 const refreshToken = await AsyncStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN);
 51	 if (refreshToken) {
 52	 const response = await this.client.post('/auth/refresh', {
 53	 refreshToken,
 54	 });
 55	 
 56	 const { token } = response.data;
 57	 await AsyncStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN, token);
 58	 
 59	 // Retry original request
 60	 originalRequest.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
 61	 return this.client(originalRequest);
 62	 }
 63	 } catch (refreshError) {
 64	 // Refresh failed, redirect to login
 65	 await this.clearAuthData();
 66	 throw this.createApiError(error);
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	
 70	 throw this.createApiError(error);
 71	 }
 72	 );
 73	 }
 74	
 75	 private createApiError(error: any): ApiError {
 76	 if (error.response) {
 77	 return {
 78	 message: error.response.data?.message || 'An error occurred',
 79	 status: error.response.status,
 80	 code: error.response.data?.code,
 81	 };
 82	 } else if (error.request) {
 83	 return {
 84	 message: 'Network error. Please check your connection.',
 85	 status: 0,
 86	 };
 87	 } else {
 88	 return {
 89	 message: error.message || 'An unexpected error occurred',
 90	 status: 0,
 91	 };
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	
 95	 private async clearAuthData() {
 96	 await AsyncStorage.multiRemove([
 97	 STORAGE_KEYS.TOKEN,
 98	 STORAGE_KEYS.USER,
 99	 STORAGE_KEYS.REFRESH_TOKEN,
 100	 ]);
 101	 }
 102	
 103	 // HTTP Methods
 104	 async get<T>(url: string, config?: AxiosRequestConfig): Promise<T> {
 105	 const response = await this.client.get<T>(url, config);
 106	 return response.data;
 107	 }
